verbs.description: In the [ARGM-TMP: 2018] [ARG0: conservative media] [V: miasma] and rightist blogosphere , the worst possible epithet is calling someone a , “ Never Trumper . ” In that dimension of ideological unreality , being labeled a “ Never Trumper , ” means that you are congenitally defective , a ...
